divs: Sighting Detailsapprox 430am i stepped out into my backyard to have a cigarette and i wasdrinking coffee. i observed an object, a slim flying wing moving at a high rateof speed from south to north. the object was white, had no exterior lights andmade no sound. i would estimate the altitude somewhere around 2000 feet. mydog did not have an adverse reaction, nor did i....i observed the object forapprox 5-6 seconds. that is how long it took to move across the sky. theweirdest thing i have ever seen
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sherman Oaks
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: flying wing white in color, no lights, no sound
